title: SCP-8200: The Phantom Sea
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]

“And when only one spirit remains—[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8200 one planetary revenant with a hunger that could swallow stars]—what happens then?

I fear we're about to find out.”

[[image https://i.imgur.com/VYkoXf1.png]]

[[/=]]
